attributes.action: Library In Memory  Of The 96 Killed At Hillsborough Instead of One Being Created In Memory Of Margaret Thatcher
attributes.additional_details:
With the recent death and funeral of Margaret Thatcher there have been calls for a Library to be created in her honour.

Margaret Thatcher was at the helm of the establishment when there was a cover up into the truth of what really happened on that terrible day back in 1989.

It is only now after a very long and persistent campaign by the relatives of the "96" that the truth is emerging about Margaret Thatcher's involvement in the aftermath and cover up.

As a tribute to those that lost their lives and the devoted efforts of those who worked very hard to unearth the truth we should be creating a lasting and tangible memorial to them instead of a very unpopular and destructive ex prime minister.

If you agree with us please sign and share.
